document_data.name: Havnaether's Fist
document_data.mainbody: '''Havnaether's Fist''' was an adventuring party of the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: They were employed as agents by [[Othdil Mauneiyn]] and [[Roekandal]] in their search for the [[Crown of the Undying Flame]].
